BookCourier is designed for students, researchers, and book lovers. Anyone who needs to borrow or return books from participating libraries can use the service. All you need is an account and a library membership where applicable.

query: Can I request multiple books at the same time?
ans: Yes! You can request multiple books in a single order, depending on the library’s borrowing rules. The system will show you the available books and allow you to select all the ones you want before confirming your request.

Delivery times vary based on your location and the library’s schedule. Typically, books are delivered within 1–3 business days. You can track your request in your BookCourier account to see the delivery status.

query: Are there any fees for using BookCourier?
ans: BookCourier may charge a small delivery fee depending on the library and distance. The system will display the total cost before you confirm your request, so there are no surprises. Some libraries may also offer free delivery for certain users or promotions.

query: Is BookCourier available in all districts?
ans: BookCourier is gradually expanding. You can check availability by selecting your district on the map section or searching directly from the homepage.

query: Do I need a library membership to use BookCourier?
ans: Yes, most partner libraries require a valid membership. Some public libraries allow borrowing without membership depending on local policies.

query: Can I schedule a return pickup?
ans: Absolutely. You can schedule a return pickup directly from your dashboard by selecting the borrowed book and choosing a suitable pickup time.

query: What happens if a book is unavailable?
ans: If a book is unavailable, BookCourier will notify you and may suggest alternative libraries or similar editions if available.
